hero.scan: Просто відскануйте QR-код на вашому столі.

about.about: З вишуканою кухнею, приготовленою з дарів моря, та панорамним видом на нескінченні блакитні води, ми обіцяємо незабутній досвід харчування біля океану.

alert.oops: Ой. Щось пішло не так. Ваше повідомлення не було надіслане. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
alert.inside: Ви повинні бути всередині ресторану, щоб викликати офіціанта.
alert.else: Чи не бажаєте ще щось замовити, замість рахунку?
alert.enableLoc: Будь ласка, увімкніть послуги геолокації (АБО ПЕРЕЗАВАНТАЖТЕ СТОРІНКУ), щоб мати змогу викликати офіціанта. Нашому додатку потрібно перевірити, чи ви всередині ресторану, інакше ви не зможете викликати офіціанта.

page1.2: QR Codes for Beach Bars: Increasing Profits and Customer Satisfaction
page1.3: QR Codes - The Future of Beach Bar Service

page2.1: Imagine relaxing on the beach while receiving fast, seamless service without ever waving down a waiter.
page2.2: I'm excited to share a solution that solves common pain points for customers and beach bar owners alike.

page3.3: Long wait times mean customers order less
page3.4: Difficult for waiters to quickly serve all customers
page3.5: Delays in ordering and paying reduce sales

page4.2: Unique QR- code for each umbrella.
page4.3a: Customers can easily order shisha by scanning the QR code
page4.4a: Customers can scan the QR code to directly call their waiter
page4.5a: The QR code allows customers to request their bill
page4.6a: Scanning the code allows customers to instantly reorder their last drink
page4.7: A custom option CREATED for your business.

page5.2a: Scan QR-code, open app, press button, wait for waiter. It's just that simple.
page5.3a: Get notifications about new orders, bill requests, etc., in a group chat, where staff can also communicate.

page6.2a: Happy clients tend to No rush. No need to keep leave more tips.
page6.3a: No need to keep leave more tips. track of all hands waving to you, or clients calling you - just keep your phone switched on.
page6.4a: The waiter can see whether it's his table number calling him or not.

page7.2: Get service without waving down waiters.
page7.3: Order more with faster service time.
page7.4: Relax instead of looking for waiter
page7.5: No need to keep leave more tips. track of all hands waving to you, or clients calling you - just keep your phone switched on

page8.2: It's a win-win! More sales and happier customers.

page1.2: QR Codes for Beach Bars: Increasing Profits and Customer Satisfaction
page1.3: QR Codes - The Future of Beach Bar Service

page2.2: CLIENT PRESS THE BUTTON - WAITER GET IT. JUST AS EASY AS IT IS.

page3.3a: Client can directly call waiter with only clicking one button.
page3.4a: Client can request bill doing just 2 actions - scanning code and pressing button.
page3.6a: Client can instantly reorder the last drink, pressing one button.
page3.7a: Skip the back and forth: know if they're paying by card upfront. Less running around for the waiters!
page3.8a: You do not need to come to the customer first, then call the shisha guy. Waiters run fewer kilometers, clients wait less.
page3.9a: And send a waiter who speaks it like a pro!
page3.10a: Client could only call the waiter once they're inside the restaurant.
page3.11a: No complex installation needed. Each waiter simply receives their unique QR code, leading them directly to the app.

page6.3a: Simply download the app to your smartphone using the link we provide.
page6.4a: We will create a fully customized webpage for your beach bar,tailored to your specific needs.
page6.5a: We will print all the QR codes you need for your tables and umbrellas. Just let us know the quantity required.
page6.6: Affix the QR Codes to Tables
page6.6a: Attach the QR codes to your tables and/or menus. Your customers just need to scan them to access the service.
page6.7a: Enjoy satisfied clients, happy waitstaff, and increased orders!
